thread.title: Chevrolet of Naperville makes new SUVs available
thread.title_full: Chevrolet of Naperville makes new SUVs available

author: admin
title: Chevrolet of Naperville makes new SUVs available
text:
Chevrolet of Naperville 
NAPERVILLE, Ill., Sept. 30, 2015 /PRNewswire-iReach/ -- The 2016 class of Chevy vehicles arriving daily to Chevrolet of Naperville is one of the most impressive in a long time. Many of the vehicles have been upgraded with new technology to truly make them a part of the 21st century. Everything from telematics to GPS navigation has been refreshed and/or updated. Two of the models that have gone through this technological revolution are the 2016 Chevy Tahoe and 2016 Chevy Suburban. Both world-class, full-size SUVs are available for a closer look in the Chevrolet of Naperville showroom. Additionally, both vehicles have also had a number of safety systems added to help drivers prevent an accident from happening in the first place. 
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20150929/272099 
For more than 80 years, the Chevy Suburban has offered impressive capability and performance. One year removed from a nearly total redesign, the 2016 Chevy Suburban in Naperville, IL arrives to the Chevrolet of Naperville inventory as the most fuel-efficient model built to this point. It features aerodynamic elements and a wholly modern engine with cutting edge technology to help conserve as much fuel as possible. One of these technologies is Active Fuel Management which can automatically disable cylinders in the engine to increase fuel economy and reactivate them when more power is required. 
Also available in the Chevrolet of Naperville showroom is the 2016 Chevy Tahoe in Naperville, IL . While the 2016 Tahoe and 2016 Suburban share a number of elements, the former has a slight towing advantage over the latter. Owners of the 2016 Tahoe will be able to tow 8,400 pounds, just edging past the new Suburban. Both vehicles will be able to help drivers get more use out of their iPhones through the Apple CarPlay suite of applications. Also, the 2016 Tahoe features the Chevy 4G LTE Wi-Fi hotspot. This will allow up to seven devices to be connected simultaneously to the high-speed internet connection. 
Anyone can view the Chevrolet of Naperville inventory by visiting the dealership's website, www.chevroletofnaperville.com . The showroom is located at 1515 West Ogden Avenue, Naperville, IL 60540. Current and potential customers with questions about the 2016 Chevy Tahoe or 2016 Chevy Suburban may contact a Chevrolet of Naperville sales professional today by calling 855-315-0245. 
Media Contact: Tom Gregg, Chevrolet of Naperville, 855-315-0245, tgregg@napervilletoyota.com 
News distributed by PR Newswire iReach: https://ireach.prnewswire.com 
SOURCE Chevrolet of Naperville
